text: ao kaun teanglay robsakhnhom. chaur puok anak tow haey saeubsuor rk you so hv ning baaunobrosa( poun yea min) robsa ke haey kom asasangkhum pi kar braosabranei robsa a l laoh . pitabrakd nasa kmean anak na mneak asasangkhum pi kar braosabranei robsa a l laoh laey leuk leng te krom del brachheang bonnaoh
